content.detailedDescription: On july 4th, 1970, my family and i attended a family reunion at my grandmother's home in zephyrhills, florida. after dinner, the kids were sent outside to play.Grandmother's home sat on five wooded acres off chancey road. it was just barely dark enough to play kick - the - can. there were the 7 of us cousins, plus my aunt and a friend ( who was a year older than i). someone in the group, i cannot recall which of us, pointed out a very bright light approaching from the southeast. we thought it might be a helicopter out of macdill afb because it was flying very low to the ground and slower than an airplane. (back note : both my dad and grandfather were air force veterans. we were familiar with both airplanes and helicopters). we stopped playing to watch the light. it was very bright, moving just above treetop level. i thought to myself that it must be a huge helicopter, until it came to a halt right above a neighbor's barn. that's when we kids began exclaiming over it, because a helicopter would've been audible at that distance. we all walked to the road, out of the trees to get a better look. this put us within 200 feet of the craft. i could see an oval, metallic shape, with a bright light at the bottom central area. a beam shot down, illuminating the barn and yard. the neighbor girl was very upset - it was hovering over her yard and barn. i asked out loud " what is that?" one of my cousins said she was scared and began crying. i wasn't cared, exactly. more like filled with a frightening awe. we stood there, in the dark, watching this craft for about ten minutes. suddenly, the craft shot up - straight up - at an incredible speed - like a rocket. it was out of sight in a few seconds. my sister said "nobody's going to believe us." but we all ran inside nonetheless, yelling and screaming, to tell our parents. they didn't believe us. four of went back outside, i think in the hope we'd see another one. (this was about fifteen minutes later.) off in the distance i heard that distinctive whop-whop of a helicopter getting closer and i remember us kids said to each other 'now that is a helicopter." then we heard a second helicopter. they also came out of the southwest, also flying just above treetops, so we heard them long before we saw them. both had searchlights on, scanning the ground. i was, strangely, more frightened of the helicopters - what they meant just being there -  than of the craft i'd seen earlier. nervously, we all ran back inside. none of us kids talked about what we'd seen. it was obvious no one would believe us. so, i kept quiet about what i'd witnessed when i was twelve years old.
content.summary: My cousins and i witnessed a ufo in early evening; it hovered  over a nearby barn.

content.detailedDescription: My my brother thinks that on february 13th 2015 he brought an alien life form home with him from a friends house. the aliens  can make themselves invisible but has let him see them. they are not aloud to talk to him so they communicate by touch. for instance, 1 touch for yes or 2 for no when he asks questions. at first he says there were over 50 but now there is only one female that has claimed him.She says that the males of her race no longer have genitalia so they are here to be impregnated in hopes to have male children  to reproduce. it takes them 3 days to get here from...I think it's name was mintaka. the 3rd star in orion's belt. they use dark matter engines and can reach speeds not imaginable. 1000s of times the speed of light. they have been here for many years. there species along with 4 other alien races that she knows of helped to create the pyramids and other things on earth. so far this is all i know. he has said that she was ok with me meeting her but to tell you the truth, i'm scared. i can send you his text message to an email address that you provide. which go farther into detail. i am sort of a skeptic about this but from everything he has told me i think i believe him. he has never been a person to make up stories for no reason.
content.summary: My brother is saying he has an alien entity with him every day. i have pages of text messages that i can send you.  he is also willing to let ppl come and see for themselves.

content.detailedDescription: I was 16 and walking to a friends house at night. i didn't have a car yet but walked across town. small town of northwood, ia. i was almost to their house and on the sidewalk of their block. it was past 9 around 10 pm because it was dark and stars were out. i just had a weird feeling to stop walking and look up. and i saw a big bright white/silver glowing saucer/circular object just hovering directly over me above the tree line. there was no sound no wind, no nothing. i compared it to stars but it was much bigger and brighter. i looked around and no body else was near to see it. i wanted to run but i was on such awe of it i just starred at it till it left. as i starred about a minute later it did a bright flash like a camera flash and maybe 30 seconds later it took off straight west and was gone in 1/2 a second. i wiped my eyes and at that point i knew we are not alone and i told my friends and they didn't believe me. but i know what i saw and will never forget it.
content.summary: Hovering bright light/white saucer

content.detailedDescription: I was across the street lying down on a trampoline looking up at the sky with my next door neighbor. we both saw a huge disk 50ft in diameter fly over us treetop altitude. no lights and no sound. it was so close to us it blocked out the moon light when it flew over. only 3-4 seconds and it was gone. they only thing that happened afterwards is i looked over at my friend and we both acknowledged what we saw and we went home immediately. i felt strange.
content.summary: Huge disk flying over me 50ft above

content.detailedDescription: Many individuals witnessed this encounter in 1990 and was blown away by what we all saw
content.summary: Me and friend sleeping on beach. woke up about 3:00 am , seen what i thought was the sun

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with my father, having picked him up from work. as we headed east on lincoln avenue and were a few blocks from lake michigan, we saw what looked like elongated "m" shapes over the like traveling south. we thought they were clouds or something else when they went in front of the moon and they were solid, moonlight not penetrating them. he stopped the car, we got out to look, and the 7 objects went up and out of sight.
content.summary: 7 elongated m" shaped objects over lake michigan, went up and away very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Approximately one year ago i was at home with a friend talking on my back deck.  my friend was sitting and i was standing. i was looking east at the sky.  i interrupted the conversation when i pointed out what i thought was a satellite slowly traveling north in the sky.  then the objects speed increased very quickly and looked more like a comet.  the speed again increased and the object crossed the entire skyline and was out of sight in a matter of a couple of seconds.  i have never seen anything travel so fast and there was no noise at all.  i was in the air force for a few years when i was younger, but i never have seen anything travel so fast.  my friend that was with me at the time had spent time in the army and neither of us had ever seen anything like that.
content.summary: Lighted object spotted in the sky that accelerated and traveled with extreme speed

content.detailedDescription: I was northbound i 5 in northern cal.  corning was 15 miles ahead and i noticed two perfict holes aprox, 1 mile across one right next too the other  with bluegreen, or aquagreen mist seamed to be poring down around the rim of both holes, i stoped at the corning rest area to get a better look.          now i coulid get a good look than i noticed somthing elce in the north but i could not see what it was .  i needed a pair of  binoculrs.   thats when i saw  dark triangles in groups of 3 and 5 suddlnly pop into view and emeaditly somthing that looked like wispy silky clouds started to pour out the edgdes of all the triangles and in just a few seconds all you could see was just 3 or 5 fluffy clouds  this went on for four hrs.
content.summary: I saw 7000 to 8000 large dark triangles in  groups of 1,3 and 5 in 4 hrs.A 4 hr

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a walk about 75 yards from my house.
i heard an unusual buzzing sound and turned and looked back over my left shoulder and saw what appeared to be a small metallic delta wing airplane flying at probably 30 mph. its speed and direction didn't change and it passed over nearby trees and out of sight. it seemed to me that it stopped making a sound and that it had landed. i went in the direction it was headed and searched for it but never found anything. my thoughts and feelings at the time was wondering where it came from and disappointment that i couldn't find it. at the time, being about 10 years old, simply was not impressed just disappointed. later with maturity and curiosity i cannot explain how a small plane like that could be flying in a small town in east texas where i knew everyone and it was before radio controlled planes were made. the sound it made was not at all like a radio controlled plane. it had no propeller. flew slowly. what powered it? it must have been nuclear powered since it couldn't have carried enough gasoline to be flying in chester, texas  probably hundreds of miles or from who knows where.
content.summary: A metallic flying object making a buzzing sound flew over at a height of about 40 feet.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting by a fire and i looked up and to see an object i assumed it was a helicopter but when got close i didnt hear anything so i looked again and i see a diamond shape thing with three lights one was red one was green then the last one was white i spun slow and slowly went over me and just went off into the distance i couldn't stop looking at it until it was gone that's what i saw.
content.summary: Big diamond shape thing with three lights red green and white

content.detailedDescription:
Albany airport closed to traffic until 0800 each day, no heliport at marine base, sighting 0530..  observed north of chem. plant, lower than pecan trees and appeared to be size of small aircraft. two very bright white lights appeared to be 25 -30 feet or so apart, four smaller lights in between pulsating singly in random pattern. i parked south of plant, only one there, watched as lights slowly moved south (estimated 1/2 mile) to stop in line with my position as i looked west. time to move from north to south of plant approx. 1-2 minutes, stationary on south side of plant 5-10 minutes. lights reflected on trees, lights were behind trees but few leaves yet on trees.  i watched as lights either 1. moved directly away from me at slow speed until falling to pinpoint and gone or 2. slowly decreased in size without moving until gone.  at no time was i aware of movement away, and lights were slightly above and behind a prominent tree limb for reference. bright white lights reflected on trees and ground but did not have glare to my observation. after it had moved south and then stopped i suddenly had the thought that "omg it is watching me!"  very unnerving.  after that thought is when it diminished in size or left.  no noise ever, very stable flight, nothing erratic. flint river approx. 1/4 mile west of plant, i felt like lights were over and following river, that would allow for being behind trees and not over.
i was part of construction management team, ex military (field grade army-infantry) and have had other observations before and after, this was the most visual.
content.summary: Pulsating lights following river n to s, hovered then moved west close observation

content.detailedDescription: My family and my buddies family went outside on our front lawn to see if we could see the russian sputnik. our parent's said there it is and my friend and i looked up for it. then i saw it and pointed it out to my buddy. i saw this small dot of light moving from the north west going to the north east. then i noticed another dot of light moving from the north east to the north west on the same path like they would crash into each other. one of the dots stopped and moved to it's left then they passed each other  continued on till they were out of sight. during this time i looked over at our parent's and saw that they were looking at another light that was moving from the west heading east. i lost contact with my friend over the years and reconnected about 3 years ago after 30 years and i asked him did he remember it and he said yes.
content.summary: Two lights one moving from nw to ne the other moving from ne to nw

content.detailedDescription: The several crafts were seen in the sky for several nights at 10:13 pm til 10:28 pm by several people at approx. 1500 ft. at the end of the weeks seen one craft was seen over a trailer park that made the lights on all the trailers blink and the people heard a humming sound. this was 200 meters from my house. i did not hear anything. one resident called as it happened to see if i heard anything. i did not. a few days later my two friends that have seen the crafts several times as i did were going down a country road at about 10:30 pm and noticed a light to our left possibly following us. i would stop the car and the craft stopped. this happened several times. this time the craft was about 200 feet above the ground and 150 feet to our left. it was summer of 1973. we had our windows down and heard nothing. i pulled into a farm field entrance toward the craft and stopped. it did not move but kept pulsating. we decided to drive back to my place and get the telescope we in hope of seeing the crafts in the past few weeks. i backed out and headed north toward my place, it followed. i pulled into the drive and ran in the front door, grabbed the scope and out the back door. the only chance was to see it as the light binked on. i got in view and seen a grey surface with no windows. it kept going toward town. speeding up until it was over the federal prison at this time it went straight up into space in about 3-4 seconds. the strange thing about the movement was that the craft did not move as a car that you can see. the craft was only visible as the light was on and did not move while the light was on. the light would go off and come back on in another location and so on. the faster the blink the faster the craft traveled.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Grey dome top with one light and no windows

content.detailedDescription: While on a fishing trip on big chief lake in hayward wisc. my wife and i noticed a very bright  star in the northern sky around 10 pm that night. we first thought it was nothing but we noticed that it moved very quickly to the north and few seconds it changed position to southwest and then dropped to the south in the sky. after half an hour of watching this flying around in all directions we started to get scared and quickly left and retired into our cabin. this happened in 1972 and no one ever believed us.
content.summary: Fishing off shore with wife observed light changing quick directions .

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my house on the front porch, waiting for the school bus to get there. i went out early i'm not sure why exactly. i noticed it right away. there were at least five or more of them. they were bright in the dark morning sky. at first i was scared, but i knew this was once in a lifetime opportunity. i dared myself to get a camera, but i didn't, i was afraid if i left and came back it wouldn't be there again. 

it was an odd mix of colors. all the colors in our rainbow mostly brown from the mixing of the colors. the cloud was very large and was distorting as if something was in it and trying to get out. it was trailing around. normal clouds don't do that. as this was happening there was at least three other large round smoky, fire like, warm colored spheres that seemed to keep a round shape. even when they soared through the sky at paces that if i looked away i would loose sight of them. it was so odd. they posed no threat to me as far as i knew. i pulled up a camping chair to sit and watch. they had no knowledge that i was there on the top of another foothill watching. even though they were far away i could clearly see they were large.

one specifically kept swooping down past the tree line and coming back up and continuously did this at separate paces. i believe from what i remember that i saw another light below the trees on the foothill on the other side of the one under the clouds and objects. i thought i was imagining it even in that situation. they often made impossible turns and dropped height to gain height in impossible ways as if they had their own rules on gravity like they could have their own foci point, but bend it at their will. their was a lot of them in the sky they were swooping around, dipping, flipping, turning and i would have to say they were showing off like they were dancing. the way they moved was imposiable. 

that object in the trees rose out of it and i was starting to worry. the one from the trees was just like the others, yet i felt a little unsettled by it. i hoped if it was on a road no one was harmed by it and i haven't investigated if their was. 

the cloud burst in areas to let out other sphere like, burning like faintly seemingly on fire. this began to scare me. the cloud was a nest. their had to be hundreds in that mass cloud. i was terrified and i think i stayed in the chair, hoping they couldn't see me. i knew the ones that were there were going to leave soon and they did. one stayed behind for a while with another that seemed to vibrate from one specific focal point to another back and forth. it was an odd short distance. the other kept itself close, but zig zagged. i could see in the cloud, but my recollection is misty when i try to remember i feel light headed. the last thing i remember about the cloud is that all the things disappeared into it and i saw inside of it briefly. from those few seconds i remember i can confidently say there were mass numbers.

i forgot about the incident for the rest of the day. only when i got home and my memory was triggered i felt excitement to tell my parents. my mother believed me and when i tell others they seem insulted or look at me odd. i often forget about this and i hope i can remember it tomorrow. when i remember a single part of the incident it slowly unravels and i begin to remember, just like remembering dreams. this is not the first flying thing i have seen in the sky. i often see other odd things around where i live, but we all seem to forget about the incidents or care less. it happens, so often, but ufo's are a rare incident. this is a regular thing for many of us where i live. i know from my own experiences and the only other person i know that takes notice to these events that there is something uncanny here. i want to know what it all this mesns...
content.summary: I saw light the on the mountain over and they seemed to "dance" in the sky and corrupt the clouds. it was a hapy mood and interestingly calm.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
A few weeks before this incident, my wife and i were riding around it was about 8:30 pm.(not quite all the way dark yet) i was driving and i noticed a bright light in the sky and was thinking its too light out to be a star. my wife fussed at me bout not paying attention to the road when i showed her what i was looking at, she started to say it was a radio tower light when the object appeared to drop two objects out of it. the objects circled around the larger object then took off in different directions. within a few moments one of the objects flew directly overhead. i couldn't make out all the details of it but the lights were white and flickering like a strobe light.  i told my son when we got back home and he didn't believe me. 

a couple weeks later, i returned home from work around 8pm. i saw the object again around in the same place. i told my son, and we both went outside to watch after bout 20 minutes the object just disappeared. we watched for a lil while longer and as we were geting ready to go inside we witnessed a lot of planes and other objects in the sky. some seemed to be normal planes with normal light coloring. then we started seeing objects that look like planes but had orange and green colored lights and made no sound. after awhile of watching these we started seeing triangle shaped objects.  then we seen one that seemed to be traveling a lot lower and slower then the others. i ran inside to get my binoculars. when i looked through i could clearly see three lights on the tips of the triangle. as we watched, there was a large bright orange ball of light that emitted from the front of the triangle that appeared to engulf the front half of the triangle as the light retracted the triangle changed shape into that of a plane. i looked through the binoculars again and now can clearly see that it had wings like a plane with the lights in normal position for a plane but were still orange and green. i was completely amazed it was like something seen in the movies. it flew off to the south and there wasn't any activities in sky.
content.summary: My son and i witnessed several objects some planes some triangle shape the largest triangle emitted a large bright orange ball of light towards its tip for bout 5 to 10 sec as the light retracted it was no longer a triangle shape but now a plane

content.detailedDescription: It was 4th of july about 10:30 p.M. i was with two of my friends we had finished up setting off fireworks for the night. my one friend and i we're sitting outside under the canopy when her and i both noticed something glowing in the sky moving rapidly at the same moment. i was seeing one orb behind her from where i was sitting and she was seeing one passing on the other side of the canopy. we both jumped up to see what it was and as we did we started counting. we were counting 1 or after another coming from the southern direction single file, flying north northwest and gaining altitude as they traveled. the very last one came 2-3 minutes after the other 12 we saw.None of them made any sound, and they almost seemed translucent. while they were in single file they were very low i would guess a hundred feet above the treetops moving rapidly, after that they shot very high in the sky. they kind of danced around and then three of them formed a triangle formation then we watch the triangle turn directions but still in the same place in the sky. we observed this for about 15 to 20 minutes before one by one they all just disappeared high in the sky. one thing that was very strange was we saw a plane come out of nowhere it seemed, it was a very large aircraft the size of a commercial airliner and was lower than the line of pine trees at the property line! the lights on the front of it appeared to shine through the trees then the plane ascended into the sky in a s, sw direction where one of the orbs look like it went directly underneath the plane from the front. that same night we saw similar reports on ufo sights in the area, and the next day we called the local airports no pilots have reported seeing anything unusual. one woman we spoke to ended up telling us about her report of orbs in new york in the sixties though.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed 13 glowing orbs  flying single file low, shot up moving around in sky, 3 made v formation.Also saw plane kind of appear.

content.detailedDescription: Diving up 405 north bound object passed over the freeway. right over my truck at tree top level. to big to be a helocopter moved to slow at tree top level no noise.Was  their any other ufo reports in this time period.Driving between renton and everett wa.It's been on my mind off and on for a long time.
content.summary: Object passed over me while driving

content.detailedDescription: Bright white boomerang pass over our heads with no sound moving really fast and hover over 70 east freeway shooting a beam of white light onto the freeway for a few minutes then that quick beam of light off. then move up then a 90 degree turn left then made a right 90 degree turn then shot straight up into space. my supervisor look at me and said he was ex lt in the air force and there's no conventional craft can move that fast and make no sound making 90 degrees turns like that that he knows of. i told him i agree. he told me if we go back into this building and tell these people what we saw they will laugh at us. so we went back to work from our break and we never spoke of it again.
content.summary: Bright white boomrang shape from the wsat to west past over our heads with no sound hover over 70 east freeway shot a beam of light on to the freeway lit up the freeway for a few minutes then light was out and shot up mafe a quick left then a quick right

content.detailedDescription: My son and i would look out his bedroom window every night before bed. off in the distance i saw the light. a light that i have never seen before, not then and not now 30 some years later. it was very white and a perfect cylinder shape. stationary and never moved its position. i called to my husband to witness what i was seeing. we called the news team to see if anyone else had called to report the light. they took down my information and said that they would call us back ... they never called and nothing was reported on the news or in the paper for weeks to follow.  when i tell the story to people they say that it was probably this or that... i can't explain what i saw but i do know that i feel a connection to it, something inside me saying it was more than just a beam of light.  my sons are grown now but i still watch the night sky. maybe someone else saw this light that night or maybe i was the lucky one.
content.summary: Large beam of light that not like a search light.

content.detailedDescription: Bright white boomerang pass over our heads with no sound moving really fast and hover over 70 east freeway shooting a beam of white light onto the freeway for a few minutes then that quick beam of light off. then move up then a 90 degree turn left then made a right 90 degree turn then shot straight up into space. my supervisor look at me and said he was ex lt in the air force and there's no conventional craft can move that fast and make no sound making 90 degrees turns like that that he knows of. i told him i agree. he told me if we go back into this building and tell these people what we saw they will laugh at us. so we went back to work from our break and we never spoke of it again.
content.summary: Bright white boomrang shape from the wsat to west past over our heads with no sound hover over 70 east freeway shot a beam of light on to the freeway lit up the freeway for a few minutes then light was out and shot up mafe a quick left then a quick right

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i were on our way to reno from las vegas right around hawthorn . it was very late at nite. i was looking out of the window from the back seat while attempting to take a nap and saw the object. it followed us for about 20 min. i don't remember if i told my husband or not. i was just very intrigued, and watched until it disappeared.  i blinked and it was gone. i know we were going quite fast above 75 mph no speed limits back then in the middle of nowhere nevada.
content.summary: Followed directly over us for about 20 miles the disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
A good friend visiting from minnesota, we went to bed early to go on a fishing charter.  going south to get on freeway, just north of pbi, we could see the control tower, a bright light appeared in the upper middle of the windshield!  the road was empty, i was going slow and i saw my buddy out of the corner of my eye watching the light also, we said nothing.

the light grew brighter, became larger but did not move, i let off the gas, don't know why and we coasted. about 10 seconds after it appeared it blazed even brighter white light and left extremely fast in an upward right hand curve.  if i drew it, it would look like a horn of plenty.  as the object left the light grew wide and fast.  in one second it left a perfect lighted horn of plenty in the sky!  most remarkable was this>  when the object left, the atmosphere appeared to suck the light back into itself back to the original take off point, like when you drop a rock into the water.

we were amazed and talked non stop.  we pulled into a restaurant for breakfast and brought up again, "the guys in the control tower had to see it too!"  my father in law was a national airline security director and most stations knew him by face and name.  using his name i actually got a hold of the palm beach intl. control tower.  this would be much harder today i bet if even you knew someone but i got a hold of one of the operators on duty.  i introduced my self using my father in law's name and title.  then i asked, "about fifteen minutes ago, directly east of you towards the atlantic, did you see a light leave the atmosphere at a high rate of speed?"  

the answer was extremely fast, i hardly finished speaking, i was very calm. he was not calm at all.  "we didn't see anything" and he hung up with a slam.  he saw it, i could tell.  he was also pretty scared.

if he didn't see it, a report of an object in the sky near restricted air space would have prompted a lot of questions, his job of course.

that's it.  the light sucking back in like a vacuum and the perfect picture made us positive it left the atmosphere at a slight angle at a speed we don't have.
content.summary: Pre dawn siting near pbi international flight tower

content.detailedDescription: Fayetteville nc 2 people observed disk with raised bubble hover.  the thing i don't get is i remember continueing down the street and that was 30 years ago was it because i just seen a ufo possibly i don't remember walking down street 2 weeks ago you look for things you would not normally remember and that could be planted memories possible but it does seem that way ps i don't care who sees this the would needs to know..
content.summary: Two people observed disc with raised buble hovering above friends house for about several minutes 2 people scared to death

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back to london ohio from sidney ohio . it was me my mother my oldest daughter she's 9 and we had just picked my youngest daughter from her grandparents.We were driving down rt. 56 come back toward lindon as we drove over a hill my 9year old seen lights the craft was moving so slow it flew out over a field as we got closer the craft turned around flew back out over the road and hovered above the truck i stopped the truck in the middle of the road the craft stopped above the truck i rolled the window down too look at it. myself and my 9 her old were trying to look i got my phone out to take a picture of it the phone would not pick up the lights on the craft or anything the screen on the phone just stayed black. at this time my mother and my two year old were both yelling my mom was screaming for me to drive and my two year old was terrified shaking and crying so hard there was no noise coming from the craft at all it was so low i could have stood on top of the truck n touched the bottom of the ufo. as i drove away it just sat there. then just disappear.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was rectangular shape with red light stopped right above my truck in the muddle of the road my two year old daughter was more terrified then i have ever seen her i could have stood on tip of the truck and touched the craft.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was outside with the dog around 9:10 pm on this tues. night. i was inside watching tv and he called for me to come out. he told me to look up in the sky to the south. there were 3 individual white, round,lights in the shape of a triangle. we watched for awhile as the one on the right moved to the one on the left then merged together. this light eventually moved up to the top light and merged together so there was one light. i went back inside to get my phone to take a picture and when i went back out, my husband said the light had just vanished. on several occasions after this, for the next several months we saw single white lights in the same direction. they hover,sometime move up or down, sometimes merge with another light, then disappear. we have talked about this a lot since then, as we have been mystified as to what we saw, and would like to know what it was. our only conclusion was that we had seen a ufo.
content.summary: My husband and i saw 3 individual white lights in a triangle shape. they merged together then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Sept. 1987 while walking my dogs in the spuyten devil playground as i was leaving the western side of the park and heading east i notice a few people standing at the corner pointing and looking above. i was under trees and could not see what they looking at. so i stepped into the street and saw this huge triangle moving very slowly north. it had lights on the outer edge changing colors. as i reached the corner more people stopped to observe this thing. cars and buses stopped at that time there were about 15 people in awe of this. it slowly glided north and went out of sight over the trees, it took about 15 minutes. i knew at that time i was witnessing something extraordinary. i later found out that this had been going on for a while know as the henry hudson valley sightings. i never reported it then i figured others would. as a veteran i have never seen anything like in my life other than in ufo stories. i just wanted to finely go on the record.
content.summary: Very large triangel overhead w blicking colored light moving very slowly over 15 minutes. other people stopped ans watch as this object moved over the herny hudson monument.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my living room watching tv. i had my curtains open so my dog could sit in the window. he started barking and i looked out the window and saw 4 lights off in the distance coming towards my house. i thought it was a plane but realized as it got closer it wasn't a plane. i went outside to get a better look. once i was outside i saw a triangle shaped object with 5 lights underneath with a dome on top and a light coming out of the dome. i saw two silohuetts of whatever was inside this thing. while it moved like a plane, it was way to low to be a plane and didn't make any sound. it moved in a straight line and passed directly over my house, i was absolutely terrified. i ran inside to get my phone to take a picture but it was gone by the time i got back outside.
content.summary: Saw lights out window. went outside to see, triangle shaped object with lights and a dome, light coming out of dome. no sound.

content.detailedDescription: The night of hailys comet several freinds and i was on my front poarch with all lights out with telescope to watch comet.The sky was lit up with stars and comet in sight. about 1am when all the sudden a huge 500 to 1000 foot craft slid quietly across sky streight over my house and blacked out the sky .It was so close i could have hit it with a rock .Everyone was completely shocked.It was so large it covered te entire valley headed tward the town of oak ridge.We could make out strutures petruding from the bottom .The color was black .The speed tarveling was slow mayby 20 mph when it passed over.It completly blacked out the sky it was so large.It didnt make a sound.Our jaws were on the ground no one made a sound.The craft was soundless it kept the same speed and elevation till it crosses another mountain out of view and sky is back in view. i have wanted to report this for years.My friends and i still talk about this event .There is no dought to me this was not of this world.
content.summary: The nite of hailys comet seen with several freinds in the sky rite above tree line complete silence sliding above trees so big it reached from hill behind house to hill in front of house .It totaly blacked out sky while we were watching comet

content.detailedDescription: My father was driving me back from beaumont on texas 105 when we saw 3 large blurry orange blimps in the sky.There was no movement for several minutes,cars pulling over to witness as we did.Then no noise ever,left and that was it.Was watching your show and it bothered me we never told anyone outside of my mom.Have never seen anything before or since.
content.summary: 3 large orange blimps no features there for 3 minutes then left fast.Several 20 or more saw it..
